Tem um negócio próprio de venda de produtos alimentares. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (amendoim, feijão, arroz, óleo, caldo, e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja ampliar a sua casa e o seu estabelecimento para diversificar mais os seus produtos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é desenvolver mais o negócio e concluir o curso superior.
texts.en:
He's married and has four children who attend school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and doesn't support anyone else.
He runs his own business selling foodstuffs. With this loan he intends to purchase goods (peanuts, beans, rice, olive oil, broth, etc.) in order to stock up with merchandise.
In the future he wishes to enlarge his home and his store, so that he can further diversify his merchandise. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is developing his business and finishing his higher studies.

loans.use: to purchase goods for selling (peanuts, beans, rice, olive oil, broth, etc.).

loans.name: Charie

texts.en: Charie is a woman from Bien Unido, Bohol. She is married with one child. She and her husband are engaged in a fishing business for quite some time now. Charie would like to make sure that the boat that they are using for fishing is always functional. She is asking for a loan to pay for boat engine maintenance so she can have their boat engine checked and repaired. She will continue to help her husband by selling his catch in her neighborhood for a profit. The income that she will generate will provide her family a healthy diet, reinvestment in the same business and savings for her one year old baby. In the future, she hopes to have other business options so she can make her family's life better and comfortable.

loans.use: to pay for boat engine maintenance

loans.name: Laurencia

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 5 filhos dos quais 2 ainda frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
Tem um negócio próprio de venda de produtos alimentares. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, ferro, pedra e o pagamento da mão de obra), para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar a sua casa e construir dependências para os filhos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é adquirir uma viatura para transportar a sua família e garantir a formação dos seus filhos.
texts.en:
She's married and has five children, two of whom still attend school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and doesn't support anyone else.
She owns her own business selling foodstuffs. With this loan she intends to purchase construction supplies (cement, iron, rocks) and to pay for labor, so she can continue building her house.
In the future she wishes to finish building her house and to build additional rooms for her children. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is buying a vehicle for her family's transportation, and ensuring her children's education.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (cement, iron, stone) and to pay for labor, so she can continue building her house.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 4 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Tem um negócio próprio de venda de produtos diversos. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (arroz, capulanas, óleo, farinha de milho, e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja reabilitar a sua casa para melhor confortar os seus filhos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é aumentar o volume do seu negócio e a formação dos seus filhos.
texts.en:
She's single and has four children who attend school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and doesn't support anyone else.
She runs his own business selling various products. With this loan she intends to purchase goods (rice, shawls, olive oil, corn flour, etc.) in order to stock up with merchandise.
In the future she wishes to rehabilitate her home, so that her children will have more comfort. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is her children's education and increasing her turnover.

loans.use: to purchase goods for selling (rice, shawls, olive oil, corn flour, etc.).

loans.name: Haissa

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 7 filhos dos quais apenas 2 frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Tem um negócio próprio de venda de produtos alimentares. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, sanitas, banheira, azulejos, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar a sua casa e construir um murro de vedação, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é manter o ritmo do seu negócio e cuidar da sua saúde para poder conseguir realizar seus projectos.
texts.en:
She's married and has seven children, two of whom attend school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and doesn't support anyone else.
She runs her own business selling foodstuffs. With this loan she intends to purchase construction supplies (cement, toilets, a bathtub, tiles, etc.) in order to continue building her house.
In the future she wishes to finish building her house and to build a surrounding wall. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is keeping her business going at this rate and taking care of her own health, so that she's able to carry out her projects.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (cement, toilets, a bathtub, tiles, etc.) in order to continue building her house.

loans.name: Julia

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 10 filhos todos maiores de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Tem um negócio próprio de venda de material de construção. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, areia, barrotes, pedra, e outros), para reabastecer o seu Estaleiro. 
No futuro deseja reformar pois a idade já não permite fazer muito esforço, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é manter-se saudável para apoiar os seus filhos.
texts.en:
She's married and has ten children, all of them adults. She lives with her family in a house she owns and doesn't support anyone else.
She runs her own business selling construction supplies. With this loan she intends to purchase construction supplies (cement, sand, beams, rocks, etc.) in order to stock up her storage yard.
In the future she wishes to retire, because her age no longer allows her to do hard work. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is keeping herself healthy, so that she can support her children.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (cement, sand, beams, rocks, etc.) in order to stock up her storage yard.

loans.name: Julio

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 4 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
Tem um negócio próprio de corte e costura e venda de roupa. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar tecidos para fabricar roupas e aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja ampliar a sua casa e melhorar ainda mais a sua casa, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a grande concorrência no mercado das roupas.
texts.en:
He's married and has four children who attend school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and doesn't support anyone else.
He runs his own business dressmaking and selling clothing. With this loan he intends to purchase fabric for making clothes, in order to stock up with merchandise.
In the future he wishes to enlarge his home and improve it even more. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is how competitive the clothing market is.

loans.use: to purchase fabric for making clothes.

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 5 filhos dos quais 2 frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
Tem um negócio próprio de criação e venda de frangos. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, ferro, areia, pedra, barrotes, e outros), para dar continuidade a obra dE depósito de água e um aviário. 
No futuro deseja concluir as suas obras e construir uma barraca para aumentar a sua renda familiar, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o pagamento devido do empréstimo e a insuficiência de fundos para cobrir os seus projectos.
texts.en:
Rosalinda is married with five children, two of whom attend school. She lives in her own home with her family and does not support anyone else.  She has a business raising and selling chickens.  With this loan, she wants to buy construction materials (cement, iron, sand, stone, beams etc.) to continue the construction of a water tank and an aviary [chicken coup]. 
In the future, she wants to complete this construction project as well as to build a shopfront to increase her family income. She is committed to repaying the loan due in order to request further loans with Hluvuku.  
Her challenges are to repay the current loan and request sufficient funds to cover future projects.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (cement, iron, sand, stone, beams etc.) to continue the construction of a water tank and an aviary.

loans.name: Azelia

texts.pt:
Viúva e mãe de 3 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com seus filhos e sustenta mais 2 sobrinhos que vivem com ela. 	
Trabalha numa empresa privada de produção e venda de Banana como empacotadora. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (barrotes, chapas de zinco, aros, pregos, e outros) para a cobertura da obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar a sua casa e passara a viver lá com seus filhos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a subida de preços de material, insuficiência de fundos ou perda de emprego.
texts.en:
Azelia is married and has three school-aged children. She lives in her own home with her children and also supports two nephews who live with her. 
She works as a baler for a private banana company. She plans to use this loan to buy construction materials (beams, sheet metal, nails, etc.) to use for building her house. 
In the future she hopes to finish building the house and move into it with her children. She is committed to paying off this loan so she can apply for further loans from Hluvuku. 
Her greatest challenges are the rising cost of building materials, lack of money, and job loss.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (beams, sheet metal, nails, etc.) to use for building her house

loans.name: Luis

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 5 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Tem um negócio próprio de venda de produtos alimentares. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (arroz, farinha, massa, amendoim, e outros), para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja aumentar o seu nível do seu negócio e construir um estabelecimento maior, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o pagamento devido do empréstimo e o bem-estar da sua família.
texts.en:
He's married and has five children who attend school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and doesn't support anyone else.
He runs his own business selling foodstuffs. With this loan he intends to purchase goods (rice, flour, pasta, peanuts, etc.) in order to stock up with merchandise.
In the future he wishes to upgrade his business and build a larger store. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is repaying the loan as scheduled and his family's well-being.

loans.use: to purchase goods for selling (rice, flour, pasta, peanuts, etc.).

loans.name: Imigisha Group

texts.fr:
Calenie fait partie du groupe Imigisha et  habite à Gitega .Elle a 40 ans et est mariée à Roger, commerçant de vaches. Ensemble ils ont 6 enfants dont  4 étudient.

Elle fait le commerce de  vaches  depuis 15ans. 

Elle est à son dixième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter beaucoup de vaches à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Avec le gain du commerce, elle assure la ration alimentaire,  les soins de santé de la famille  et paie les frais de scolarité des enfants.
texts.en:
Calenie is a member of the Imigisha group and lives in Gitega. She is 40 years-old and is married to Roger, a cow seller. Together they have six children, four of them attend school.

She has been selling cows for the last 15 years.

This is her tenth loan with Turame. With the Kiva loan she will get, she will increase her working capital to buy a lot of cows for resell in order to earn more.

With the profit from her business, she provides for the food, the health needs of her family and pays for the schooling fees.

loans.use: increase her working capital and buy a lot of cows for resell to earn more.

loans.name: Laurinda

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 4 filhos todos maiores de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta a sua mãe mais um neto e um sobrinho que vivem com ela.
Tem um negócio próprio de fabrico e venda de roupas diversas. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar tecidos, zipes, linhas, botões, e outros, para aumentar e diversificar a quantidade de roupa na sua boutique. 
No futuro deseja construir uma mercearia para reformar no trabalho de costura, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a grande concorrência que acaba dificultando o sucesso do seu negócio.
texts.en:
She's married and has four children, all of them adults. She lives with her family in a house she owns and also supports her mother, a grandson and a nephew who live with her.
She runs his own business making and selling various clothes. With this loan she intends to purchase fabric, zippers, thread, buttons, etc., in order to stock up and diversify the garments in her shop.
In the future she wishes to build a grocery store, so she can retire from her dressmaking work. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is the high competition, which ends up making it harder for her business to succeed.

loans.use: to purchase fabric, zippers, thread, buttons, etc., in order to stock up and diversify the garments in her shop.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 3 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta seus pais enviando dinheiro para auxiliar nas despesas alimentares.
É militar e quadro do Ministério da Defesa. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, ferro, pedra, chapas de Zinco, e outros), para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar a sua casa e adquirir uma viatura para a sua deslocação ao local de trabalho, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a dificuldade financeira e a garantia da formação dos seus filhos.
texts.en:
He's married and has three children who attend school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and also supports his parents by sending them money to help with food expenses.
He's a serviceman and a staffer of the Ministry of Defense. With this loan he intends to purchase construction supplies (cement, iron, rocks, zinc sheets, etc.) in order to continue building his house.
In the future he wishes to finish building his home and to purchase a vehicle for commuting to work. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is financial hardships and ensuring his children's education.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (cement, iron, rocks, zinc sheets, etc.) in order to continue building his house.

loans.name: Juliao

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 3 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais 2 sobrinhos que vivem com ele. 	
Trabalha como motorista na ARA – SUL. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (chapas de zinco, portas, aros, janelas, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar a sua casa e abrir um negócio para ajudar na renda familiar, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a dificuldades financeiras e melhorar as condições de vida da sua família.
texts.en:
He's married and has three children who attend school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and also supports two nephews who live with him.
He works as a driver for ARA-Sul (the Mozambican Southern Regional Water Administration). With this loan he intends to purchase construction supplies (zinc sheets, doors, window frames, etc.) in order to continue building his house.
In the future he wishes to finish building his home and to start a business in order to help with his family's income. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is financial hardships and improving his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (zinc sheets, doors, window frames, etc.) in order to continue building his house.

loans.name: Arnaldo

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 3 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É militar e quadro do Ministério da Defesa. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (portas, cimento, chapas de Zinco, e outros), para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar a sua casa e adquirir uma viatura para a sua deslocação ao local de trabalho, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o pagamento devido do empréstimo.
texts.en:
He's married and has three children who attend school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and doesn't support anyone else.
He's a serviceman and a staffer of the Ministry of Defense. With this loan he intends to purchase construction supplies (doors, cement, zinc sheets, etc.) in order to continue building his house.
In the future he wishes to finish building his home and to purchase a vehicle for commuting to work. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is repaying the loan according to the schedule.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (doors, cement, zinc sheets, etc.) in order to continue building his house.

loans.name: Apélété

texts.fr: Père d'01enfant âgé de 03ans, Mr Apélété est marié à une revendeuse. Il est aussi revendeur mais lui s’est beaucoup plus penché sur la vente des produits chimiques. Il exerce seul l’activité au marché et sa difficulté est la concurrence sur le terrain. Pour garder ses clients, mieux satisfaire leurs demandes, il sollicite de WAGES un prêt pour s’approvisionner en marchandises (produits chimiques). Il voudrait être grossiste des produits chimiques à son lieu d’activité et assurer le bien – être de la famille. Il est âgé de 39ans.
texts.en:
Apélété is the father of a 3-year-old child, and is married to a reseller. He also works as a reseller, but is much more involved in the sale of chemical products. He runs his business alone in the market, and the difficulty he faces is competition in his area. 

To keep his customers and better meet their needs, Apélété has requested a loan from WAGES to buy supplies (chemical products). He would like to be a chemical product wholesaler in the area where his business is located, and would also like to ensure his family’s wellbeing. He is 39 years of age.

loans.use: To buy chemical products.

loans.name: Yawo

texts.fr: Agé de 36ans et père de 02 enfants (07 et 03ans) dont 01 scolarisé, Mr Yawo est marié à une femme qui exerce la même profession que lui c’est – à dire le commerce. Il est dans ce domaine il y a un moment et son activité s’est beaucoup plus penchée sur la vente de graviers. Il le fait juste au bord de la route. Son premier crédit qu’il sollicite dans notre institution lui servira à s’acheter du gravier pour mieux répondre aux besoins des clients. Son souhait est de s’acheter un camion pour le transport du gravier et rendre sa famille heureuse.
texts.en: Mr Yawo is 36 years old and father to 02 children (07 and 03 years old) one of whom is in school. He and his wife are both traders by profession. He has been a trader for some time and his main activity is selling gravel. He does this on the roadside. He is seeking his first loan from our microfinance institution in order to buy gravel to better meet customer needs. He would like to buy a truck to transport gravel and make his family happy.

loans.use: to buy gravel

loans.name: Afi

texts.fr: Revendeuse de pagnes, d’articles de mercerie et des biscuits depuis 1991 dans une boutique, Madame Afi est mariée à un électrotechnicien et est âgée de 40ans. Elle est maman de 02 enfants qui sont sur les bancs d'école. Elle est couturière de profession et pour pouvoir joindre les deux bouts, elle a ajouté le commerce qui lui procure le minimum. Elle sollicite de WAGES un second crédit pour s’approvisionner en pagnes, en produits de mercerie et en biscuits. Avec le profit qu’elle réalisera, elle veut accroitre son activité et permettre à sa famille de bien s’épanouir.
texts.en: A boutique retailer of pagne cloths, dry goods, and cookies since 1991, Afi is a 40-year-old woman married to an electrician. She is the mother of two children who are in school. She is a seamstress by profession and to make ends meet, she has added retailing to her business, which provides her with the minimum essentials. She is requesting a second loan from WAGES to buy supplies of pagne cloths, dry goods, and cookies. With the profit she makes, she would like to grow her business and let her family thrive.

loans.use: to buy pagne cloths, dry goods, and cookies.

loans.name: Koméssé

texts.fr: Agé de 34ans et marié à une revendeuse de bijoux Mr Koméssé est revendeur de cartes de recharges depuis 2009 de façon ambulante. Il s’approvisionne dans les sociétés de téléphonie et sollicite ce troisième prêt pour s’acheter des cartes de recharges afin de mieux répondre aux besoins des clients. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité  et prendre soin de sa famille.
texts.en:
Mr. Koméssé is married to jewelry seller. He has been selling mobile phone recharge cards door-to-door since 2009. He gets his supplies from the phone companies.
He is requesting this third loan to buy mobile phone recharge cards to better meet his customers’ needs. He wants to reinvest in his activity and take care of his family’s needs.

loans.use: to buy mobile phone recharge cards.

loans.name: Rafiétou

texts.fr: Femme d’un policier et mère de 02 enfants tous scolarisés, madame Rafiétou âgée de 34ans est revendeuse des produits de détails notamment sucre, miel, maïs, et des galettes sous un hangar. Elle s’approvisionne au Grand marché de Lomé et 02 personnes lui prêtent main forte pour l’avancement de son activité. Elle est à son premier crédit de WAGES et ce prêt lui permettra de s’approvisionner en marchandises (sucre, miel, mais et des matières premières (farine de blé, de l’huile) pour faire des galettes). Dans l’avenir, elle veut agrandir l’activité et bien éduquer ses enfants.
texts.en: Married to a police officer and mother of two school-aged children, Rafiétou is a 34-year-old retailer of products including sugar, honey, corn and pancakes. She sells her goods out of a warehouse. She gets her supplies at the Grand Market of Lomé, and two people lend her a hand to help her advance her business. This is her first loan from WAGES and it will allow her to stock up on goods and supplies (sugar, honey, corn, and raw ingredients such as flour and oil to make pancakes.) In the future, she would like to grow her business and educate her children well.

loans.use: to buy sugar, honey, and other ingredients.

loans.name: Abidé

texts.fr: Revendeuse de produits d’alimentations générales et des céréales dans une boutique depuis 2010, Madame Abidé est célibataire et n’a pas d’enfants en charges. Ses produits sont vendus à toutes personnes et elle est aidée par une personne. Vu que ses clients augmentent de jour en jour, elle sollicite de WAGES un premier prêt pour s’approvisionner en marchandises. Elle veut injecter le profit dans d’autres activités secondaires (vente de produits congelés). Elle veut plus tard se lancer dans la vie maritale et aider sa sœur à apprendre un métier.
texts.en: Madame Abidé has been a retailer of general food supplies and cereals from her store since 2010. She is single and has no children in her care. She sells her products to all kinds of customers and is assisted by one person. Because her customers are increasing day by day, she is requesting her first loan from the microfinance institution WAGES in order to get more supplies. She wants to inject any profits into other secondary activities (sales of frozen products). Later she wants get married and help her sister learn a trade.

loans.use: to buy food products

loans.name: Tsomado

texts.fr: Tôlier –soudeur de profession depuis 1986, Mr Tsomado âgé de 53ans est marié à une revendeuse et père de 06 enfants dont 04 sur les bancs d’école. Le premier est âgé de 30ans et le dernier 04ans. Son activité se fait dans un garage et il a de nombreux clients qui sollicitent son travail à cause de  sa perfection. Il sollicite de notre institution un premier prêt pour acheter des outils de travail et faire des prestations de services a ses derniers. Il veut avec les profits supplémentaires, investir une partie et épargner le reste. A l’avenir, il veut investir la vente des pièces de tôleries à la soudure et assurer le bien –être de la famille.
texts.en: A sheet metal worker and welder since 1986, Tsomado is a 53-year-old man married to a retailer and the father of six children. Four of the children are in school. The oldest of his children is 30 years old and the youngest is four years old. His business is in a garage, and he has many clients who request his work due to its perfection. He is asking the microfinance institution for his first loan to purchase tools so he can provide services to his clients. He would like to invest a portion of his additional profit and save the rest. In the future, he would like to invest in selling pieces of sheet metal for welding, and ensure the well-being of his family.

loans.use: to buy tools so he can provide services for his clients.

loans.name: Abra

texts.fr: Agée de 42ans, madame Abra est mère de 01 enfant de 05ans qui va à l’école. Pour mieux  assurer la scolarité de son seul enfant et se prendre aussi en charge, elle vend depuis 02ans des habits et chaussures (liquidation) de façon ambulante à toute personne.  Sa difficulté est la mévente par moment. En cette période de vacances, elle désire stocker plus de marchandises afin de mieux répondre aux besoins des clients c’est pour cela, elle sollicite dans notre institution un premier prêt pour son approvisionnement. Dans l’avenir, elle voudrait agrandir l’activité par l’ouverture d’une boutique.
texts.en: Madame Abra is 42 years old and is mother to 01 child who is 05 years old and goes to school. To better ensure the education of her only child and take care of him, she has been working as a street-trader selling clothes and shoes for 02 years (clearance stock) to all kinds of customers. Her main difficulty is slow sales at times. In this holiday season, she wants to increase her stock to better meet customer needs. This is why she is seeking her first loan from our microfinance institution in order to buy supplies. In the future she would like to expand her business by opening a store.

loans.use: to buy clothes and shoes

loans.name: Kéméabalo

texts.fr: Mr Kéméabalo est propriétaire d’un cafétariat depuis 2011. Il vend de la nourriture et des boissons à toutes personnes et est aidé par 01 personne. Il sollicite ce premier crédit de WAGES pour acheter un congélateur, des produits alimentaires et de la boisson. Il veut réinvestir dans l’activité, l’agrandir et dans l’avenir fonder un foyer car il est célibataire.
texts.en: Mr. Kéméabalo has owned an eatery since 2011.  He sells food and drinks to the general public and has one assistant.  He is requesting his first loan through WAGES to buy a freezer, food products, and drinks.  He would like to reinvest in his business, increase its size, and, in the future, start a family since he is single.

loans.use: to buy a freezer and food products for his eatery.

loans.name: Edem

texts.fr: Agé de 32ans, Mr Edem est un jeune homme célibataire qui vend des produits d’alimentation générale dans une boutique depuis 2011. Il exerce seul cette activité et s’approvisionne à Lomé. Pour mieux satisfaire les clients, il sollicite de WAGES un premier prêt pour s’acheter des produits d'alimentation générale. Il veut dans l’avenir renforcer son activité et assurer l’épanouissement de sa future famille.
texts.en:
Edem is a young, single man aged 32, who has worked selling general food products in a store since 2011. He runs this business alone, and gets his supplies in Lomé. 

To better meet his customers’ needs, Edem has requested his first loan from WAGES, which he will use to buy general food products. In the future he would like to strengthen his business, as well as to ensure that the family he plans to have in the future gets ahead.

loans.use: To buy general food products.

loans.name: Jaime

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 2 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É agricultor e dono do próprio negócio. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar adubos, pesticidas, combustível e outros, para aplicar na sua machamba. 
No futuro deseja aumentar mais Hectares de cultivo e melhorar o seu nível de produção, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é trabalhar mais para aumentar o seu rendimento.
texts.en:
He's married and has two children who attend school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and doesn't support anyone else.
He's a farmer and runs his own business. With this loan he intends to purchase fertilizer, pesticide, fuel, etc., to use on his farm.
In the future he wishes to expand his farm with more hectares. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is working harder in order to increase his profits.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, pesticide, fuel, etc., to use on his farm.

loans.name: Badegdg

texts.fr: Revendeur de céréales depuis 2009 à toutes personnes à domicile, Mr Badegdg est âgé de 37ans et marié à une revendeuse. Il s’approvisionne à Lomé et dans les villes voisines de Lomé. Pour mieux répondre aux besoins des clients et avoir plus de bénéfices, il sollicite l’aide de WAGES par un troisième crédit afin d' acheter des sacs de céréales. Il veut renforcer l’activité et ajouter d’autres activités complémentaires. Avec les bénéfices, il veut assurer l’éducation de ses futurs progénitures.
texts.en: Mr. Badegdg has been selling cereals to the public at large since 2009. He is 37 years old. His wife is a vendor. He stocks up in Lomé and in the nearby towns. In order to better meet customer demand and increase his revenues, he is seeking a third loan from WAGES intended for the purchase of some bags of cereals. He would like to bolster his business and add some secondary activities. He would like to earn enough to be able to provide for the education of his future children one day.

loans.use: to buy cereals.

loans.name: Eduardo

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 8 filhos todos maiores, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É pensionista da Ara-Sul. Com este empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, blocos, ferro, areia, e outros), para construir uma fossa na sua casa. 
No futuro deseja terminar a fossa para melhorar as condições de saneamento da sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a insuficiência de fundos disponíveis.
texts.en:
He's married and has eight children, all of them adults. He lives with his family in a house he owns and doesn't support anyone else.
He's a pensioner of ARA-Sul (the Mozambican Southern Regional Water Administration). With this loan he intends to purchase construction supplies (cement, bricks, iron, sand, etc.) in order to build a septic tank for his home.
In the future he wishes to finish building the septic tank in order to improve his family's sanitation conditions. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is not having enough funds available.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (cement, bricks, iron, sand, etc.) in order to build a septic tank for his home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy kitchen utensils for resale.

loans.name: Akouavi

texts.fr: Couturière de profession et cela depuis 1990 dans un atelier, Madame Akouavi est mère de 01 enfant âgé de 12ans qui va à l'école.  Elle même est âgée de 46ans. Elle sollicite dans notre institution un premier crédit pour s'approvisionner de la machine à coudre et aménager son atelier. Elle veut renforcer son activité et assurer l’épanouissement de la famille.
texts.en:
Mrs. Akouavi has been a seamstress in a workshop since 1990. She is the mother of a 12 year-old child who attends school.  She is 46 years old.

She is requesting a first loan from our organization to buy a sewing machine and outfit her workshop. She wants to strengthen her business and foster the development of her family.

loans.use: outfit her workshop and buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Ayaovi

texts.fr: Madame Ayaovi est âgée de 40ans. Mariée à cambiste, ils ont 02 enfants (12 et 08ans) qui sont sur les bancs d’école. Pour aider son mari dans les charges du foyer, elle vend des appareils électroménagers et divers sur étalage au marché. Sa difficulté principale est le retard dans la livraison des fournisseurs. Son second crédit qu’elle sollicite lui servira d’acheter des appareils électroménagers. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité, devenir grossiste et assurer une meilleure vie à la famille.
texts.en: Ayaovi is 40 years old and married to a Forex trader. She is the mother of two children (12 and 8) who are in school. To help her husband with the household expenses, she sells appliances and other home products from a stall in the market. Her main difficulty is when the delivery of her supplies is delayed. This second loan that she is requesting will allow her to buy appliances. She would like to reinvest in her business, become a wholesaler, and ensure a better life for her family.

loans.use: to buy appliances and other home products.

loans.name: Mikossodé

texts.fr: Jeune femme célibataire de 25ans, Madame Mikossodé est revendeuse de produits de mercerie dans une boutique depuis 2011. Elle sollicite ce premier crédit de WAGES pour s’approvisionner en marchandises. Elle veut dans l’avenir devenir grossiste en mercerie, se prendre en charge et se lancer plus tard dans la vie maritale.
texts.en: Mikossodé is a young, single woman aged 25, who has worked reselling dressmaking items in a store since 2011. This is her first loan from WAGES, and she has requested it to buy merchandise. In the future she would like to become a dressmaking supplies wholesaler, take care of herself and, later, get married.

loans.use: To buy dressmaking items.

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
Lorna works hard to support four children. She is married and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Lorna requested a loan of 1,500 PHP through NWTF to buy a solar lamp.

She is getting the solar lamp, because she wants to save money by minimizing her kerosene expenses.

Lorna is aware that, by using the solar lamp, she is not only saving money but also helping the environment and reducing health and hazard risks to her family.

loans.use: to purchase a solar lamp.

loans.name: Eliza's Group

texts.en:
Eliza is 55 years old and lives in Sumasap, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. She is married with four children. 

Eliza has a hog fattening business and earns approximately 3,000 PHP each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to be used in purchasing feed for her hog fattening business. 

Eliza has been a member of PMPC for one year. In the future, she hopes to engage in other types of business. Eliza is the leader of a two-person group. Although they borrow as a group, each member has her own business.

loans.use: to purchase feed for her hog fattening business.

loans.name: Pouaneoé

texts.fr: Revendeuse de produits d’alimentation générale et cela depuis 2005 à domicile,  madame Pouaneoé est mariée à un commerçant et ils ont en charge 03 enfants qui ont 17, 12 et 05ans. Les enfants vont tous à l’école. Elle a des clients de part et d’autres de la ville de Lomé et elle voudrait les satisfaire à chaque fois qu’ils font les demandes c’est pour cela elle sollicite de WAGES un prêt pour s’approvisionner en marchandises (riz, huile, végétale, sucre et divers). Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité et contribuer aux dépenses du ménage au coté de son mari.
texts.en:
Mrs. Pouaneoé is a reseller of general food products working from her home since 2005. She is married to a merchant, and the couple have three dependent children aged 17, 12 and 5. All three children go to school. 

Her client base spreads all over the city of Lomé, and she wants to be able to meet customer demand. To that end, she is seeking a loan from WAGES to stock up on merchandise (rice, vegetable oil, sugar and various other items). 

She wants to reinvest in her activity and help her husband to pay for the household expenses

loans.use: to buy general food products for resale.

loans.name: Nisreen

texts.en: Nisreen is a 33-year-old married woman from Al Russeifeh, Jordan who has 5 family members. She is requesting a loan of 500 JOD to pay for her home improvements. She wants to buy new furniture. In the future she would like to expand her home and she is planning on adding another room. Also she hopes to establish a project.

loans.use: to pay for her home improvements

loans.name: Hakemah

texts.en: Hakemah is a 34-year-old married woman from Al Khaledieh AL Mafraq who supports 5 family members. She is requesting a loan of 500 JOD to pay for her home improvements. In the future she would like to increase her family income. Also she hopes to buy a new home.

loans.use: to pay for her home improvements

loans.name: Raed

texts.en:
Raed is a 31-year-old married man from Al Russeifeh, Jordan. He is requesting a loan of 800 JD to pay for his home improvements. 

In the future he would like to increase his family's income and hopes to buy an independent house.

loans.use: to pay for his home improvements.

loans.name: Abir

texts.en: Abir, 33, is a married woman from Madaba, Jordan who helps support five family members. She is requesting a loan of 500 JOD to purchase materials for making pickles and mulukhia (a traditional vegetable dish). She wants to expand her current project where she sells these food items at her small shop.

loans.use: to buy materials for making pickles.

loans.name: Hadil

texts.en: Hadil, 27, is a married woman from Al Zarqa, Amman, Jordan who lives with her husband. She is requesting a loan of 800 JOD to buy new furniture and home appliances. Since Hadil is under 30 years old, her loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to pay for home improvements.

loans.name: Nabil

texts.en: Nabil is a 57 year old married man from Marka, Amman, Jordan who supports 2 family members.  He is requesting a loan of 1500 JOD to buy a new photo printing machine.  He plans on opening a photo printing shop.  He hopes that in the future, he will be able to purchase his own home for his family.

loans.use: to pay for a photo printing machine

loans.name: Hajir

texts.en: Hajir is a 28 year old married woman from Al Zarqa, Amman, Jordan who lives with her husband.  She is requesting a loan of 400 JOD to improve the general condition of her home and to buy new furniture. Since Hajir is under 30 years old her loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to pay for home improvements

loans.name: Fatima

texts.en: Fatima is a 30 year old married woman from Marka, Amman, Jordan who lives with her 4 family members.  She is requesting a loan of 600 JOD to replace her old furniture and buy new pieces.  Her future plans are to buy a family home.   Since Fatima is 30 years old, her loan is considered a youth loan.  She prefers that her photo not be on the internet so the person in the photo is her husband.

loans.use: to pay for home improvements

loans.name: Abir

texts.en: Abir is a 31 year old married woman from Marka, Amman, Jordan who lives with three other family members.  She is requesting a loan of 600 JOD to buy paint to repaint her home.  In the future she would like to buy a car for her family.  Her aspirations are for her children to all complete their education.

loans.use: to pay for paint to improve her home

loans.name: Waood

texts.en: Waood is a 32 year old married woman from Sahab Jordan who supports 4 family members.  She is requesting a loan of 400 JD to pay for her home improvements.  In the future, she wants to improve her social economic status.

loans.use: to pay for her home improvements

loans.name: Samar

texts.en: Samar is a 43 year old married woman from Hay Nazal, Jordan who supports 4 family members.  She is requesting a loan of 800 JOD to buy materials to make flower arrangements, which she sells. She hopes to be able to open a small shop to sell these flower arrangements.  Her dream is to buy her family a home.  Samar prefers not to have her photo on the internet. The photo is of her son.

loans.use: to buy materials for flower arranging

loans.name: Sahar

texts.en: Sahar is a 53 year old widow from Al Zarqa Amman, Jordan, who has 2 family members.  She is requesting a loan of 500 JD to pay for food items.  She makes Zaatar, a traditional spice mix in her home for sale.  In the future, she would like to expand her project by opening a shop which will help increase the number of customers and increase her income.  She hopes to be able to continue her sons education.

loans.use: to pay for food stuffs to sell

loans.name: Wael

texts.en: Wael is a 46 year old married man from  Baqa'a Jordan, who supports 4 family members.   He is requesting a loan of 1200 JD to pay for items such as coffee, tea and cigarettes for sale at his cafe.  In the future, he wants to open shops in many other locations.  He would like to increase his family's socioeconomic status.

loans.use: to pay for products for his cafe to sell

loans.name: Maisa'a

texts.en:
Maisa'a is a 25 year old married woman from Sahab Jordan, who has one family member.  She is requesting a loan of 500 JD to pay for  perfumes, makeup and accessories, all products she sells out of her home.  She hopes to increase her income by adding to the inventory.
Since Maisa is under 30 year old, her loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, makeup and accessories for sale.

loans.name: Shama

texts.en: Shama is a 43 year old married woman from Sahab, Jordan, who supports 4 family members.  She is requesting a loan of 400 JOD to purchase mobile phone accessories and mobile phone credit refill cards, to help expand her current project of selling them.  She hopes to increase her profit and be able to better support her family.  Shama prefers that her photo is not on the internet, the above photo is of her husband.

loans.use: to pay for mobile phone accessories and credit refill cards

loans.name: Manthr

texts.en: Manthr, 33, is from Al Zarqa, Amman, Jordan. He is requesting a loan of 1,000 JOD to help with expenses that he needs for welcoming his bride into his home. He will be buying new furniture, kitchen appliances and making general improvements to his home. He hopes that in the future he will be able to buy a computer and have internet at home.

loans.use: to pay for his marriage expenses.

loans.name: Inam

texts.en: Inam,57, is a married woman from Al Khaledieh, Al Mafraq, Jordan who lives with three family members. She is requesting a loan of 400 JOD to help with home improvements to expand the home and to buy new furniture. She would like to do this to make her home a more comfortable living space for her family. Inam prefers that her photo is not on the internet thus the above photo is of her husband.

loans.use: to make home improvements.

loans.name: Mana

texts.en: Mana, 34, is a married woman from Al Zarqa, Amman, Jordan who has six family members. She is requesting a loan of 700 JOD to buy new furniture for her home and generally improve the condition of her home. Mana prefers that her photo is not on the internet thus the above photo is of her husband.

loans.use: to help pay for home improvements.

loans.name: Celeste Group

texts.es: Mariela tiene 26 años de edad, es miembro del Grupo Solidario Celeste, es casada y madre de 2 hijos, su esposo se dedica a la actividad del cultivo de café, son personas luchadoras, honestas y responsables, ellos residen en la Comunidad de La Unión, Olancho. Ella desde hace cinco años se dedica a la venta de ropa usada, oficio que aprendió por sus propios esfuerzos, su horario de atención es de 8:00 am a 6:00 pm. El préstamo que Mariela solicita lo necesita para invertirlo en la compra de fardos de ropa con estilos que estén a la moda para así poder llamar la atención de sus clientes y que de este modo pueda aumentar sus ventas. La vida económica de Mariela ha cambiado grandemente desde que recibe el apoyo de los préstamos de FAMA. Su meta es mejorar el negocio y enseñarles a sus hijos a trabajar de forma honesta, ya que es la mejor herencia que puede dejarles. Este es el sexto crédito que Mariela solicita en FAMA y hasta el momento ha pagado puntualmente sus cuotas.
texts.en: Mariela is 26 years old. She is a member of the Celeste Solidarity Group. She is married and the mother of 2 children. Her husband works growing coffee. They are hard-working, honest and responsible people. They live in the community of La Unión, Olancho. For the past five years, Mariela has worked selling used clothing, a profession she learned through her own efforts. She serves her customers from 8:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. Mariela needs the loan she is requesting to invest in buying bales of clothing with styles that are in fashion, so that they will be attractive to her customers, and thus she can increase her sales. Mariela's economic life has gradually changed since she began receiving support through FAMA's loans. Her goal is to improve her business and teach her children how to do honest work, which is the best inheritance she can give them. This is the sixth loan that Mariela has requested with FAMA, and up to now she has always been punctual with her loan payments.

loans.use: to buy bales of clothing.

loans.name: Garba

texts.en: Garba is a 30-year-old woman from Madaba, Jordan, who helps support five family members. She is requesting a loan of 500 JOD to buy materials to make traditional mosaics. This will expand her current project of making and selling mosaics. She hopes that this will increase her profits so that she can support her family.

loans.use: to pay for materials for mosaic making.

loans.name: Ana Cecilia

texts.es:
La señora Ana Cecilia esta casada, tiene 25 años de edad, cursó los 6 años de educación primaria, tiene 1 hijo, se dedica al comercio a la venta de cosméticos por catalogo, inicio este negocio con una sala de estética y hasta el momento le¡va 1 año de experiencia, cuanta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica a la construcción.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de productos: perfumes, cremas, lociones, etc. Espera tener un local propio para mejorar su atención.
texts.en:
Ana Cecilia is 25 years old, she is married and she has 1 child. She has completed the 6 years of primary school and she is a retailer selling cosmetics via catalogue. She has started this activity in a beauty salon, and at the moment she can count on 1 year of experience. Her husband works in constructions and she can count on his support.

She is requesting a loan to buy products such as perfumes, creams and lotions. She hopes to have a locale of her own in order to improve her service.

loans.use: To buy perfumes, creams and lotions.

loans.name: Amenah

texts.en:
Amenah is a 26-year-old, married woman who supports three family members from Al Zarqa, Amman, Jordan. She is requesting a loan of 500 JOD to buy clothes to sell to her friends and neighbors.

In the future, Amenah hopes to expand her project.

Amenah prefers not to display her photo on the internet; thus the above photo is of her husband.

Since Amenah is under 30 years old, her a loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Mirfat

texts.en: Mirfat is a 30-year-old, married woman from Hay Nazal, Jordan, who lives with her three family members. She is requesting a loan of 400 JOD to help pay for the cost of repainting her house. Since Mirafat is 30 years old, her loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to help pay for the cost of repainting her house.

loans.name: Hala

texts.en:
Hala is a 29-year-old, married woman from Al-Hashmi-Amman, Jordan. She is requesting a loan of 1,300 JOD to buy clothes to sell to friends and neighbors.

In the future, Hala would like to buy a home. She also wants to expand her project by opening a shop. 

Since Hala is under 30 years old, her a loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Amaal

texts.en:
Amaal is a 40-year-old, married woman who has two family members from Hay Nazal, Jordan. She is requesting a loan of 500 JOD to pay for cosmetic products to sell.

In the future, Amaal would like to open a shop for perfumes and accessories. She hopes to buy a home.

loans.use: to buy cosmetic products to sell.

loans.name: Raba'a

texts.en:
Raba'a is a 48-year-old, married woman who has six family members from Bani Kenanah, Irbid, Jordan. She is requesting a loan of 500 JOD to pay for home improvements; she will be repainting her home.

In the future, Raba'a would like to improve her standard of living.
 
Since Raba'a is a conservative woman she is unwilling to upload her photo on the internet. The photo is of her son.

loans.use: to pay for repainting her home.

loans.name: Alejandrina

texts.es:
La señora Alejandrina esta casada, tiene 31 años de edad, se gradó como maestra de educación primaria, se dedica a la atención a una tienda, inicio este negocio con su propia iniciativa y hasta el momento lleva 2 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica a impartir clases en una escuela.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para la compra de mas productos para la tienda que tiene: aguas gaseosa, jugos, golosinas, queso, etc, ya que solo así tendrá mejores ventas. Espera en el futuro tener una capital amplio.
texts.en:
Alejandrina is 31 years old, she is married and she has a primary school teacher degree. She has been running a general store for 2 years, an activity she has started out of her own initiative. Her husband is a teacher in a school, and she can count on his support.

She is requesting a loan that she will use to buy more products for her store such as sodas, juices, sweets and cheese in order to improve her income. In the future she hopes to have a significant r working capital.

loans.use: To buy sodas, juices, sweets and cheese.

loans.name: Fallaha

texts.en:
Fallaha is a 54-year-old widow who supports two family members. She is from Madaba, Jordan.

Fallaha is requesting a 600 JOD loan to buy blankets to sell to her friends and neighbors. In the future, she wants to expand her projects.

loans.use: to buy blankets to sell

loans.name: Fatina

texts.en:
Fatina is a 54-year-old widow with two family members. She is from Al Zarqa, Amman, Jordan.

Fatina is requesting a 500 JOD loan to pay for home improvements and buy new furniture. In the future, she wants to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: pay for home improvements and buy furniture

loans.name: Anaheed

texts.en:
Anaheed is a 39-year-old married woman who has two family members. She is from Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan.

Anaheed is requesting an 800 JOD loan to buy clothes to sell to residents of her area. In the future, she wants to open a shop and she also hopes to buy a car.

loans.use: to buy clothing to sell

loans.name: Hiyam

texts.en:
Hiyam is a 46-year-old woman from Al Khaledieh, Al Mafraq, Jordan, who lives with three family members. Hiyam prefers that her photo does not appear on the internet, and this photo is of her son.

Hiyam is requesting a 600 JOD loan to purchase new furniture and kitchen supplies. Her future plans are to keep improving her home for her family.

loans.use: to purchase new furniture and kitchen supplies

loans.name: Asma

texts.en:
Asma is a 24-year-old married woman from Sahab, Jordan, with two family members. 

Asma is requesting a 300 JOD loan to buy new furniture for her home. She also plans to add an additional floor to her home. Since Asma is under 30 years old, her loan is a youth loan.

loans.use: to pay for home improvements

loans.name: Manal

texts.en:
Manal is 37 years old, married, and has four other family members.  She is from Al Hashmi Amman Jordan. 

Manal is requesting a loan for 1,000 JOD, which she will use to buy various products to sell such as household products,clothes, and accessories. In the future, she would like to renovate a room in her home specifically for selling her products.  She also wants to increase her income.

loans.use: to purchase household products,clothes, and accessories to sell.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.en:
Sonia is a 33-year-old married woman with four family members. She is from Al Nasser, Amman, Jordan. Sonia prefers not to display her photo on the internet and this photo is of her husband.

Sonia is requesting a 400 JOD loan to pay for materials for flower arrangements that she sells to shops. In the future, she would like to start a project and buy a home for her family.

loans.use: to pay for materials to make flower arrangements to sell

loans.name: Elham

texts.en:
Elham is a 23-year-old single woman from Al Khaledieh Al Mafraq, Jordan. Since she is under 30 years old, her loan is a youth loan.

Elham is requesting a 500 JOD loan to pay for blankets to sell. In the future, she hopes to develop this business and increase her income.

loans.use: to pay for blankets to sell

loans.name: Ala'a

texts.en:
Ala'a is a 28-year-old married woman from Al Nassar, Amman, Jordan, who helps support three family members. She prefers not to display her photo on the internet and this photo is of her husband. Since Ala'a is under 30 years old, her loan is a youth loan.

Ala'a is requesting a 400 JOD loan to buy styling supplies for her beauty salon. In the future, she plans on opening a salon. Ala'a aspires to buy her family a home.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her beauty salon

loans.name: Amal

texts.en:
Amal is a 30-year-old married woman from Sahab, Jordan, who lives with her three family members. She prefers that her photo not be displayed on the internet, and this photo is of her husband. Amal is 30 years old and her loan is a youth loan.

Amal is requesting a 1,000 JOD loan to buy new furniture, repaint her house, and improve the house facilities. In the future, she would like to keep improving her home for her family.

loans.use: to pay for home improvements

loans.name: Catherine

texts.fr: Cathérine est une femme de 52 ans,célibataire,mère de 04 enfants dont l'âge varie entre 13 et 25 ans.Deux de ses enfants vont encore à l'école.Elle a ouvert et gère un bar près de son domicile dans un quartier de la capitale depuis 10 ans déjà.Son activité fonctionne normalement grâce à son accueil chaleureux et son expérience qui lui ont permis de conquérir une clientèle importante.Mais cependant,la croissance considérable de sa clientèle ne lui permet guère de satisfaire à la demande  de celle-ci,ceci dû à la petitesse de son capital d'où l'importance de ce crédit en moment pour son activité,car il l'aidera à augmenter le nombre de casiers de boissons ce qui lui permetrra non seulement de satisfaire sa clientèle ,mais d'augmenter ses ventes et ses bénéfices.Elle réinvestira une partie de ces bénéfices dans son activité et le reste lui permettra de subvenir aux besoins quotidiens de sa famille.
texts.en: Catherine is a 52-year old woman and the mother of four children ranging from 13 to 25 years of age. Two of her children are still in school. She has opened a bar near her home, in one of the capital city’s districts, and has been managing it for 10 years already. Her business is going well thanks to the friendly welcome she offers to customers as well as to her long experience allowing her to attract a sizeable clientele. However, the substantial growth of her customer base prevents her from keeping up with the demand, given her limited capital, which is why the present loan is so important to her business at this moment. The loan will allow Catherine to add more cases of beverages, thus not only meeting demand but increasing her sales volume and her revenues. She will reinvest one part of the revenues in her business and use the rest to provide for everyday family needs.

loans.use: to buy cases of beverages.

loans.name: Maina

texts.en: Maina is a 43-year-old married woman from Irbid, Jordan. She is requesting a loan of 500 JOD to buy new furniture and paint so that she can improve her home for her family. Her goals for her family are to have her children educated. Maina prefers that her photo is not on the internet. The photo is of her husband.

loans.use: to pay for home improvements

loans.name: Wala

texts.en: Wala is a 22-year-old married woman from Ashrafia, Amman, Jordan who helps support 2 family members. She is requesting a loan of 600 JOD to buy clothes which she will be selling to help increase her family's income. She hopes to expand her current project selling clothes. Since Wala is under 30 years old her loan is considered a youth loan. She prefers that her photo is not on the internet, thus the photo is of her mother.

loans.use: to buy clothes for retailing

loans.name: Sahar

texts.en:
Sahar is a 48-year-old married woman from Al Russeifeh, Jordan, who has four dependents. 

She is requesting a loan of 500 JOD to do home improvements. She is planning on buying new furniture and a new dresser.

loans.use: to pay for home improvements.

loans.name: Aziza

texts.en: Aziza is a 42-year-old widow from Irbid, Jordan who supports two family members. She is requesting a loan of 500 JOD to buy new furniture and to paint her home.

loans.use: to pay for home improvements

loans.name: Mahmmed

texts.en:
Mohammed is 50 years old and lives in New Kru Town. He is married. He did not go to school, but his wife is a business woman. They have four children between the ages of  9 and 15 who are currently attending school.

For the past seven years, he has been running a shop where he sells rice, flour, oil, etc., in the community. He makes a lot of profit since he is the only one who is involved in that business in his community. One of the problems he faces is lack of sufficient income. 

He is requesting a loan to purchase more rice, flour and oil to expand his business. He plans to build a house for his children in years to come and educate them.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, flour and oil to expand his business.

loans.name: Ibtisam

texts.en:
Ibtisam is a 26-year-old married woman who has 4 family members from Al Karak, Jordan. She is requesting a loan of 500 JD to pay for her home improvements; she will be repainting her home. In the future she would like to expand her home.

Since Ibtisam is under 30 years old, her loan is considered a youth loan.

Ibtisam is a conservative woman so she is unwilling to upload her photo on the internet. The photo is of her husband.

loans.use: to pay for her home improvements

loans.name: Abdul Rahman

texts.en: Abdul Rahman is a 22-year-old man from Ashrafia, Amman, Jordan. He is requesting a loan of 900 JOD to pay his university tuition. This is a part of his development through education. Since Abdul Rahman is under 30 years old his loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to pay for tuition

loans.name: Raida

texts.en: Raida is a 28-year-old married woman from Ashrafia, Amman, Jordan who has 2 dependents. She is requesting a loan of 800 JOD to buy clothes which she will be reselling. This will help her to expand and develop her current project selling clothes. She would like to do this to increase her family income. Since she is under 30 years old her loan is considered a youth loan. She prefers that her photo is not on the internet. The photo is of her husband.

loans.use: to buy clothes to resell

loans.name: Mana

texts.en: Mana is a 27-year-old married woman from Ashrafia, Amman, Jordan who has 2 dependents. She is requesting a loan of 400 JOD to buy clothes to resell. This is so that she can develop her current project and increase her family's income. Since she is under 30 years old her loan is considered a youth loan. She prefers that her photo is not on the internet, thus the photo is of her husband.

loans.use: to pay for clothes to resell

loans.name: Tahani

texts.en:
Tahani is a 39-year-old married woman from Al-Hashmi, Amman, Jordan, who supports one of her family members. 

She is requesting a loan of 400 JOD to buy accessories, which she sells. She is planning on opening a small shop to sell these accessories. In the future she would like to buy her family a home.

loans.use: to pay for accessories that she sells.

loans.name: Neda'a

texts.en:
Neda'a is a 42-year-old married woman from Al Hashmi Amman Jordan who has 4 family members. She is requesting a loan of 600 JD to pay for materials and cosmetic products such as make-up and a hair dryer. In the future she would like to open a salon and she hopes to buy a home.

Neda'a prefers not to display her photo on the internet, thus the above photo is of her daughter.

loans.use: to pay for materials and cosmetic products

loans.name: Abeer

texts.en:
Abeer is a 33-year-old married woman from Al Russeifeh, Jordan, who has five family members. 

She is requesting a loan of 600 JOD to pay for her home improvements. She will be repainting her home and she wants to expand it.

In the future, she is planning on adding another room, and also, she would like to create a project.

Abeer is a conservative woman. She is unwilling to upload her photo on the Internet, so the photo is of her husband.

loans.use: to pay for her home improvements.

loans.name: Kahlifeh

texts.en:
Kahlifeh is a 46-year-old married man from Al Karak, Jordan, who has one family member.

He is requesting a loan of 600 JOD to pay for food for his market. In the future he would like to expand his market because he wants to increase his family income.

loans.use: to pay for food for his market.

loans.name: Ghalib

texts.en:
Galib is a 46-year-old married man from Jubaiha, Amman, Jordan, who supports five family members. 

He is requesting a loan of 800 JOD to pay for fuel (gas and diesel for homes) that he sells from his utilities shop. He hopes that this will help increase his income.

loans.use: to pay for fuel for his utilities office.

loans.name: Maisa'a

texts.en:
Maisa'a is a 28-year-old married woman from Bani Kenanah, Irbid, Jordan, who supports two family members. 

She is requesting a loan of 300 JOD to pay for her home improvements. She will be repainting her home and she also wants to expand it.

In the future, she would like to buy new furniture and she is planning on adding another room.

Maisa'a prefers not to display her photo on the Internet, Thus the above photo is of her mother.

Since Maisa'a is under 30 year old, her loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to pay for her home improvements.

loans.name: Zeinab

texts.en: Zeinab is a 34-year-old woman from Irbid, Jordan who has 3 dependents. She is requesting a loan of 300 JOD to replace her old furniture and buy new pieces for her home.

loans.use: to pay for home improvements

loans.name: Maha

texts.en:
Maha is a 42-year-old married woman from Al Zarqa, Amman, Jordan, who has three dependents. She is requesting a loan of 300 JOD to buy materials to paint her home. Her hopes for the future are that her family's socio-economic status will improve. 

Maha prefers that her photo is not on the Internet. The photo is of her husband.

loans.use: to pay for home improvements .

loans.name: Maha

texts.en: Maha is a 26-year-old woman from Al Zarqa, Amman, Jordan who helps support 3 family members. She is requesting a loan of 400 JOD to buy clothes which she will be selling. She is striving to improve her family's socio-economic status. Since Maha is under 30 years old, her loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to pay for clothes which she will sell

loans.name: Abeer

texts.en:
Abeer is a 36-year-old married woman from AL Zarqa, Amman, Jordan. She is requesting a loan of 600 JOD to pay for clothes to sell to residents of the area. In the future she would like to increase her family's income and she hopes to continue her son's education. 

Abeer is a conservative woman so she is unwilling to upload her photo on the internet. This photo is of her husband.

loans.use: to pay for clothes to sell

loans.name: Haneen

texts.en:
Haneen is a 22-year-old married woman from Al Zarqa, Amman, Jordan, who helps support two family members. 

She is requesting a loan of 700 JOD so that she can buy new furniture. She is also buying paint so that she can repaint her home. S

ince Haneen is under 30 years old, her loan is considered a youth loan. 

She prefers that her photo is not on the Internet, thus the photo is of her brother.

loans.use: to pay for home improvements.

loans.name: Fatihia

texts.en: Fatihia is a 60-year-old woman from Marka, Amman, Jordan who has four dependents. She is requesting a loan of 500 JOD to pay for painting her home and making it a more comfortable space for her family. In the future she would like to own a home.

loans.use: to pay for home improvements

loans.name: Nawin

texts.en: Nawin lives in Kakata Town with her husband and three children. For three years now, she has been running a beauty salon where she sells quality artificial hair. A problem she has faced is that she has less income to build a standard salon because she sells quality artificial hair that is not found at other salons. She is happy with her business because it sustains her family. She is requesting a loan to purchase more artificial hair and to build a better salon for her customers. In the future, she wants to build a house for her children.

loans.use: to purchase more artificial hair and to build a better salon for her customers

loans.name: Kosal

texts.en: Kosal is 38 years old. She is widowed and resides with three children in Prey Veng Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in cultivating rice and fattening up cattle for more than ten years, earning approximately $3 per day. Her children are employed in a garment factory. They earn about $12 daily. Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Kosal is requesting a loan of $1200 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would enable her to use the money saved on her transportation expenses to support her family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting

loans.name: Nabila

texts.en: Nabila is a 39-year-old married woman from Al Zarqa, Amman, Jordan, who has four dependents. She is requesting a loan of 500 JOD to pay for home improvements. She will be repainting her home.

loans.use: to pay for home improvements.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther is 40 years old and lives in Jacob Town. She is married and has two children, ages 14 and 23, who live at home with her.

For 14 years now, Esther has been running a medicine store in her community where she save the lives of many community members since there are no health facilities in her community. She learned this business from a local medical school she attended. She is requesting a loan to purchase pharmaceutical drugs (e.g Paracetamol, Quinine, Amodaquine, cough syrup, etc.). She plans to open a clinic in the near future and to educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase pharmaceutical drugs (e.g. Paracetamol, Quinine, Amodaquine, cough syrup, etc.)

loans.name: Chan Thou

texts.en: Chan Thou is 55 years old. She is married, lives in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia and is blessed with a son. She has been selling noodle and porridge for more than two years, earning approximately $4 per day. Her husband is a retired teacher who earns about $2 each day. Her son is employed in a rubber plantation. He earns about $3 daily. Because her present house is too old, Chan Thou is requesting a loan of $1500 to purchase timbers to rebuild her house. This money will help her provide better living conditions for her family. In the future, she would like to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase timbers to rebuild her house

loans.name: Kebbeh

texts.en: Kebbeh is 37 years old and lives in Bardnersville. She is married and has two children, ages 10 and 15. For the past six years, Kebbeh has been running a shop where she sells many items like toothpaste, soft drinks, water, etc. She has a lot of customers and her daily sales are very high during the dry season. She is requesting a loan to purchase more soft drinks, water, etc. for her business. She plans to expand her business and wishes her children will have a brighter future.

loans.use: to purchase more soft drinks, water, etc. for her business

loans.name: Safa'a

texts.en:
Safa'a is a 24-year-old married woman from Al Karak, Jordan who supports two family members. She is requesting a loan of 400 JD to pay for her home improvements. She is planning on adding another floor to her house. In the future, after she finishes repayment of this loan, she would like to request another loan to buy new furniture.

Since Safa'a is under 30 years old, her loan is considered a youth loan.

Safa'a prefers not to display her photo on the internet, thus the above photo is of her husband.

loans.use: to pay for her home improvements.

loans.name: Sok Heang

texts.en: Sok Heang is 55 years old. She is married and resides with three children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has been selling groceries for more than two years. In addition, she runs a tailoring shop and earns about $8 each day. Her husband is a doctor. He earns about $4 daily. In order to improve her family’s finances, Sok Heang is requesting a loan of $1500 to purchase more groceries to resell. By doing so, she would earn more profit to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her store and help her children earn a bachelor’s degree. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to resell

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is 35 years old and lives in Logan Town. He is married and his wife is a businesswoman. They have three children between the ages of 5 and 7 who attend school.

Peter has been operating a provisions shop for the past three years where he sells soap, toothpaste, rice, and oil, among other things. He says sometimes he experiences loses, but not all of the time. He is requesting a loan to purchase more rice, oil, soap, and other items for his business. He hopes to extend his business to other counties and to send his children to college in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, oil, soap, and other items for his business.

loans.name: Hong

texts.en:
Hong is 31 years old, married, and has one child.  He lives in Kampot Province, Cambodia. He has been selling ice cream for more than six years, earning approximately $6 a day. His wife is involved in cultivating rice and fattening up animals, earning about $2 a day. His son is employed in a garment factory, earning about $3 a day. 

In order to improve his family’s finances, Hong is requesting a loan of $1,000, which he will use to purchase a motorbike and a trailer for carrying ice cream to sell. This purchase will help him carry ice cream in larger amounts and earn more money to support the family. In the future, he would like to expand his business and rebuild his present house to make it more convenient for his family.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike and a trailer for carrying ice cream to sell.

loans.name: Edgar Rene

texts.es:
El señor Edgar Rene es soltero, tiene 26 años de edad, cursó sus estudios de bachiller, se dedica actualmente a la carpintería, inició  siendo trabajador y lleva 5 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo para usarlos para capital de trabajo y producirá mas muebles, ya que esta vez va a compra madera, y mejorar así sus ganancias. Espera mejorar su negocio y tener mas capital.
texts.en:
Sr. Edgar Rene is 26 years old, single, and completed his high school education. He currently works as a carpenter, but initially started out as a laborer. Edgar has five years of experience.

He is requesting a loan to use as operating capital so that he can produce more furniture. At this time, he will buy wood so that he can improve his earnings. He hopes to improve his business and have more capital.

loans.use: to buy wood.

loans.name: Residenciales El Campo N° 2 Group

texts.es: Santos Blacina tiene 51 años de edad, es casada, tiene cuatro hijos, y es integrante del Grupo Solidario Residenciales El Campo Nº 2. Santos se dedica a la venta de productos cosmeticos, ella decidio inscribirse al programa de venta por catalogo de Avon y como trabaja en una farmacia en sus tiempos libres hace visitas domiciliarias y va enseñando los productos en los catalogos y cuando no cuenta con mucho tiempo los deja y luego regresa. Una de sus dificultades es que da credito y algunas veces sus clientes le quedan mal con la fecha de pago. El prestamo lo necesita para comprar mas y variados productos de belleza como ser: esmalte de uñas, sombras de ojos, delineador de ojos y labios, rimel, entre otros. Los prestamos obtenidos le han ayudado a tener su propia casa porque antes no tenia. Unas de sus dificultades es que vende de forma ambulante y cuando le pagan ella tiene que movilizarse con dinero en efectivo y la han asaltado varias veces. Su meta es trabajar muy duro cada dia para tener su propio local. Ha sido clienta de FAMA por mas de 21 ciclos y ha demostrado alta responsabilidad en el pago de sus cuotas.
texts.en: Santos Blacina is 51 years old. She is married and has four children, and she is a member of the Residenciales El Campo No. 2 (El Campo Residences No. 2) communal bank. Santos sells cosmetics. She decided to join the Avon catalogue sales program. Since she works in a pharmacy, in her free time she makes home visits and shows the products in the catalogues. When she does not have a lot of time, she leaves it and returns to it later. One of her difficulties is that she gives credit, and sometimes her customers don't make their payments on time. She needs the loan to buy more of a variety of beauty products such as nail polish, eyeshadow, eyeliner and lip liner, and mascara, among other items. The loans she has obtained have helped her to have her own house, because she didn't have it before. One of her difficulties is that she sells door-to-door, and when she gets paid she has to walk around with cash. She has been robbed several times. Her goal is to work very hard every day in order to have her own store. She has been a member of FAMA for more than 21 cycles, and she has demonstrated a high level of responsibility with her loan repayments.

loans.use: to puchase cosmetics.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy steel sheets, bars, a welding iron and bolts.

loans.name: Jose Sebastian

texts.es:
El señor Jose Sebastian esta casado, tiene 20 años de edad, curso los 6 años de educación primaria, se dedica a la artesanía, inicio este trabajo con el apoyo de su suegra y hasta el momento lleva 1 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa, quien se dedica al mismo trabajo.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de 16 varas de trama, la cual usara para realizar un tejido de corte, espera en el futuro contar con 6 trabajadores.
texts.en:
Jose Sebastian is 20 years old, he is married and he has completed the 6 years of primary school. He is a craftsman, and he has started this activity 1 year ago thanks to the support of his mother-in-law. His wife engages in the same activity, and he can count on her support.

He is requesting a loan the will be used to buy 16 yards of thread that he will use to create a traditional clothes. In the future he hopes to be able to hire 6 employees.

loans.use: To buy thread to create a traditional clothes.

loans.name: Maria Caridad

texts.en: Maria is 47 years old and earns a living by running an upholstery store. She devotes lots of time and energy to her business in order to be successful. Maria is requesting a loan for PHP 15,000 to buy a better range of products to sell to her customers, and to improve the service she provides by buying a motorcycle. Her goal for the future is to earn enough money to pay for the education of her two children.

loans.use: provide better service to her customers.

loans.name: Rom

texts.en: Rom is 39 years old. She is married and resides with three children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in working as a chef for more than two years, earning approximately $5 daily. Her husband is a barber who earns about $8 each day. In order to improve her family’s finances, Rom is requesting a loan of $1000 to purchase farmland to cultivate cassava. This purchase would enable her to run an additional business and earn more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to rebuild her present house and help her children earn a bachelor’s degree.

loans.use: to purchase farmland to cultivate cassava

loans.name: La

texts.en:
